We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private PercentagePriceOscillator _ppo;
// In Initialize()
_ppo = PPO(symbol, fastPeriod, slowPeriod, movingAverageType);

// In OnData()
if (_ppo.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "PPO Fast", _ppo.Fast);
    Plot("My Indicators", "PPO Slow", _ppo.Slow);
    Plot("My Indicators", "PPO Signal", _ppo.Signal);
    Plot("My Indicators", "PPO Histogram", _ppo.Histogram);
    Plot("My Indicators", "PPO Current", _ppo.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
self.ppo = self.PPO(symbol, fastPeriod, slowPeriod, movingAverageType)

# In OnData()
if self.ppo.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "PPO Fast", self.ppo.Fast);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "PPO Slow", self.ppo.Slow);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "PPO Signal", self.ppo.Signal);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "PPO Histogram", self.ppo.Histogram);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "PPO Current", self.ppo.Current);
